thread.title: BRIEF-Havertys Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.13

title: BRIEF-Havertys Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.13
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Haverty Furniture Companies Inc:
* HAVERTYS REPORTS EARNINGS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q4 SAME STORE SALES FELL 3.5 PERCENT * Q4 REVENUE $819.9 MILLION * HAVERTY FURNITURE - ENACTMENT OF 2017 TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT RESULTED IN A REDUCTION IN EPS OF $0.27 FOR Q4
* HAVERTY FURNITURE COMPANIES - EARNINGS FOR Q4 REFLECT IMPACT OF BELOW PLAN SALES AND TAX ACT
* HAVERTY FURNITURE COMPANIES - TOTAL WRITTEN SALES FOR FIRST QUARTER TO DATE ARE UP ABOUT 1.7% OVER LAST YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
